title: Healing Mandalas: Blessings for Deep Serenity 2015 Wall Calendar
features: Twelve healing mandalas (sacred circles) embody blessings for deep serenity and to inspire personal growth. Artists Bonnie Gold Bell and David Sun Todd create these stunning images from close-up photographs of plants and flowers. Using a 12-sided circular design, the elements are patterned together in a kaleidoscope fashion that manifests an intrinsic healing energy vibration.
A year of healing mandalas on your wall.
A year of healing mandalas on your wall.
The perfect gift for those seeking a New Age healing meditation tool.
The perfect gift for those seeking a New Age healing meditation tool.
Each month features a blessing meditation on healing and transformational growth.
Each month features a blessing meditation on healing and transformational growth.
Printed on FSC Certified Mixed Source Paper with soy-based inks.
Printed on FSC Certified Mixed Source Paper with soy-based inks.
Published by Amber Lotus, a carbon-negative US publishing company that has planted more than 330,000 trees since 2008.
Published by Amber Lotus, a carbon-negative US publishing company that has planted more than 330,000 trees since 2008.

This calendar features US and Canadian legal holidays, phases of the moon, and important observances of the world's major religions.  These transformational images are created from photographs of flower petals, feathers, seashells, and other natural elements. Each mandala is accompanied by a blessing that evokes a state of inner peace. The inspirational words and radiant images act as a form of art therapy, providing a graceful means for healing the stresses of life and coming to rest in deep serenity.

description: Bell & Todd is the spiritual and creative partnership of Bonnie Gold Bell and David Sun Todd. Their art calling is to create media that activates and nurtures personal and planetary awakening. Guided by Source, Bell & Todd remix the code of Nature and the Cosmos into beautiful new forms. They marry words and sometimes sound to the images, and then charge these multidimensional creations with energetic blessings. They teach people how to engage with their art for evolutionary transformation. Their Big Earth Blessings projects provide new ways to bless humanity and the living world. Bell & Todds creations are published in an e-book titled
empowerment oracle, and their yearly Healing Mandalas calendars, and as fine art prints.
